skills.name: MAD MIND
desc: • Deal physical damage to a single target.
• Gain a Random Defensive Effect for 1 turn.
• Grant a Random Offensive Effect to each ally for each Burn on the target.

skills.name: EXILED FATHER
desc: • Remove Immunity, Perfect Immunity and Vanish from all enemies.
• Inflict Blind and Silence on all enemies for 1 turn.
• Grant Physical Shield and Magic Shield to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: WINGS OF ASH
desc: Grant Immunity to Perfect Corruption, Physical Burn, and Toxic Burn to all allies. Inflict Random Burn Effects on all enemies after every action.
